chapter.description: This chapter will help you get started with using ERB.

This chapter helps you begin the community engagement process that will provide the foundation for your work in ERB. This chapter guides you through considerations for community engagement such as creating connections and building and maintaining relationships.
This chapter will help you identify the hazards, disasters, and threats your community currently faces or may face in the future as well as help to determine how to become more resilient.
This chapter will help you assess how resilient and equitable your community's built, natural, and social support systems are.
This chapter will help you identify the most powerful actions to build equitable resilience in your community and set up a way forward for implementing these actions.
